text_read_aloud_speed: How fast should the text be read?
multimedia_presentation_tooltip_text:
The image appears when you click on the word.
The image appears as tooltip over the word.
The image disappears when you move the mouse away.
multimedia_presentation_top_text:
All images are seen at the same time.
They appear above the text.
multimedia_presentation_next_text:
All images are seen at the same time.
They appear next to the text.
use_symbol_language_text: A collection of symbols is also called symbol language.
use_symbol_language_which: Which symbol language do you want to use?
symbol_presentation_tooltip_text:
The symbol appears when you click on the word.
The symbol appears as tooltip over the word.
The symbol disappears when you move the mouse away.
symbol_presentation_top_text:
All symbols are seen at the same time.
They appear above the text.
symbol_presentation_next_text:
All symbols are seen at the same time.
They appear next to the text.

engine_content_replacement_instruction_1: The Easy to Read Symbol will be shown on the site if text in simplified language has been found.
engine_content_replacement_instruction_2: A click on the symbol shows the simplified text. Another click on the symbol will show the original text again.
engine_readability_instruction_2: Only the content will be displayed.
engine_screen-ruler_instruction_2: A line in the text will be brighter, like a ruler.
engine_screen-ruler_instruction_3: You can move the ruler up and down.
engine_colorize_instruction_2: Color of background and text changes.
engine_font-magnification-tool_magnify_i: Click on A+ and the font will get bigger.

engine_font-magnification-tool_shrink_in: Click on A- and the font will get smaller.
Click again and it will get even smaller.
engine_line-spacing-tool_inc_instruction: Click on the tool and the line height will get bigger.
Click again and it will get even bigger.
engine_line-spacing-tool_dec_instruction: Click on the tool and the line height will get smaller.
